column6: Summary Observation in regard to Service delivery (At the time of Audit between Aug-Nov 2023)

column3: Agriculture Cluster Development Project IDA Credit
column4: Construction of storage facilities completed for 182 farmers and Installation of value addition equipment
column6: 50 of 182 value addition equipment was non-operational and beneficiary members were not enrolled on e-voucher system in some cases

column4: Construction of national Metrology Lab at UNBS
column6: Physical works completed were estimated at 95% (monthly progress reports) by June 2023, awaiting the delivery of the chiller to handover site. Although the laboratory is substantially complete, it is not operational due to lack of laboratory equipment.
